subject: Persist tool-only responses by creating assistant placeholder
description: packages/web/src/lib/store.ts:157-241: addToolCall/finalizeToolCalls assume an assistant message exists for messageId/currentStreamMessageId. If a tool_call arrives before any assistant text (tool-only response), no assistant message exists so tool calls are invisible during streaming and dropped when finalizeToolCalls runs. Create a placeholder assistant message when first tool_call arrives or in finalizeToolCalls when no target message found.
